name: SITE SPECIFIC INDUCTION & TOOLBOX MEETING RECORD
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - All plant pre-start checks completed.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Work site to be clearly defined.
○ Use appropriate traffic control as required - separate trafficable areas.
○ Plant/equipment with operational flashing amber lights & audible reversing beepers.
○ All workers wear hi visibility safety vest/clothing.
Operating powered plant or equipment & working around mobile plant
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Only competently trained persons to operate plant or equipment.
Reversing trucks with restricted rear vision
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - A ‘truck controller’ is appointed to guide reversing trucks on job site.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Appropriate machine guarding.
○ Don’t enter paver hopper if operating
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Crew - Use Only in Lunch Break
○ Foreman/Supervisor to step AWAY from work area when using phone.
Plant roll over and contact with rotating / slewing plant
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Approach embankments/trenches from a 90 degree angle.
○ Operator to complete visual assessment of ground conditions.
○ Operator wears seatbelts when ROPS are fitted to plant.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Permit applied for if required.
○ A “spotter” is appointed to guide plant safely under low power lines.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Use battery powered tools first.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Sun hats and sunscreen.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Operator to wear all required PPE.
○ Long pants, long sleeves, safety boots, safety gloves, face shield & balaclava as a minimum.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Operator to wear safety glasses when operating hand lance.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Operator to wear all required PPE.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - “Dial Before You Dig”
Persons falling or tripping on site. Ground condition. Open excavation. Excavation cave in
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Maintain good housekeeping.
○ Barricade off unsafe areas & all battered excavations.
○ Clearly mark protruding objects using paint, cones or hazard tape.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Face protection worn as required.
Chemical or fume exposure. Welding or concrete burns
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Store and handle chemicals in accordance with relevant SDS.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Wear hearing protection where equipment is signed.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Request assistance where required.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Sufficient cool water/regular breaks.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Watch for spiders, snakes & wasps.
RISK CONTROL MEASURE - Use approved ladder on level ground & tied off appropriately.
Worker Site Specific Induction & Toolbox Meeting Sign Off
Cold planing existing pavement 50mm below finished surface (Refer CTS05 Jan 15).
Cold planing an additional 200mm below surface plane (Refer CTS05 Jan 15). Chainages 170 - 430m: All Lanes.
Cold planing an additional 200mm below surface plane (Refer CTS05 Jan 15). Chainages 0 - 170m, chainages 0 - 130m (slip lane), chainage 430 - 1064m; All lanes.
